content.detailedDescription:
1. sitting on my soft in my home watching tv with the curtains open on the back side(south)of my house.
2. the linar cloud coming straight down out of the sky with blue, pink and white pastel colors.
3. sounds funny but i thought it was a nuclear attact!
4. see coments below.
5. thought i was going to die at first then the craft flew out of the cloud and left the area, i chuckled with releif.
6. once it spead north it was gone.
linar cloud coming straight down from a blue sky with what looked like waves rolling downward at the bottom, shifted angle down to 20 degrees, leveled to 0 degrees  and stopped, with oval shaped hole at the end. then a bomerang silver craft pops out, makes a left turn to head directly north, levels it's wings, then warps(speed) away so fast i witnessed linear colors behind it, then it was gone.
content.summary: Linar cloud coming straight down from a blue sky with what looked like waves rolling downward at the bottom, shifted angle down to 20 degrees, leveled to 0 degrees  and stopped, with oval shaped hole at the end. then a bomerang silver craft pops out.

there should be a simpler way to reenter a report to attach photo's and videos without having to fill out the whole form again.  just my opinion.

fran iannitto
content.summary: Lights

content.detailedDescription: My wife was an abductee she was tormented by what she described as foreign thoughts being implanted in her mind. this lead to her suicide last may.I found this image on her lap top after her passing. i am not sure what it is but it was shot on our patio as i can see part of one of our patio chair.
content.summary: My wife was an abductee. after she passed last may i found this image on her lab top. i have much more info. if you are interested you may contact me.

content.detailedDescription: The time was about 9-9:30a.M, it was a cool, clear, sunny march morning with magnificent blue skies and good long-distance visibility. i was sitting at my kitchen table on the computer in the relatively open dining room/kitchen area with the bright skies lighting up the room. i heard a low-flying jet aircraft likely an airliner entering or exiting the pattern at boston-logan international airport (about 40 miles to the north of my house), it seemed slightly louder and more high-pitched than most of the usual modern airliners with high-bypass turbofan engines or acoustic liners and more like the older low-bypass turbofan engines on aircraft such as the md-80 series (or historically the boeing 727), the aircraft sounded lower too than usual, noting the high-pitched sound i suspected that it may not have been an airliner but possibly a air force reserve c-5a galaxy of the 439th airlift wing at westover air force reserve base out on a training sortie, as the last of the older c-5a models (all based at westover as this report was written) is due for decommissioning the before the end of 2017 my interest was peaked and i jumped to the window to get a glimpse of the aircraft. i looked into the bright blue skies but realized the airplane i heard had already passed out of view over my house, instead my eyes caught sight of something else much higher. the object appeared to be a shiny silver or grey metallic color but i am unsure if this was its actual color or just the sunlight reflecting off of it, it had the color and glint of an airliner at cruising altitude but unlike an aircraft i could clearly not see any wings or tailplane/horizontal stabilizers on the object and it produced no contrail, it was an oval, oblate, or rounded cigar shape to it with no visible appendages. i rushed out to my front porch to continue watching the object, it continued a very constant and swift path towards the south or southwest at an altitude i could not accurately determine but would guess to be in the realm of 30-35,000 feet maybe 40,000 or more depending on the size of the objects, i could not determine the size of the object due to the lack of a reference point or any surrounding objects and its sheer distance, its speed also seemed faster than that of a widebody airliner at cruising altitude (slightly). the object produced no sound however it could have been drown out by the sound of the low-flying airliner (which i could see/hear had departed to the east and i believe was most likely an airliner in the md-80 series or potentially an airbus a320 with the rolls-royce turbofans) i continued to watch the object as it continued farther from my field of view still shiny and reflective and fast, i could not photograph the craft accurately because i did not have an advanced lens camera at my disposal, only an iphone 5 which takes notoriously blurry and indistinguishable photos of far away objects. i considered running back into the house to look for my binoculars but at the rate the craft was moving out of sight it was apparent that it would most likely be out of sight by the time i came back outside with the binos. the ordeal lasted no more than 2 and a half minutes as the shiny, wingless, featureless oval continued out of sight before being obscured by trees and the horizon. as an avid aviation enthusiast with solid eyesight who frequently watches the skies for civilian and military aircraft and is skilled with identifying aircraft i can say that this did not resemble a conventional aircraft as it had no visible external features (wings, engines, horizontal stabilizers, vertical stabilizers or other aircraft parts that are clearly visible on large commercial airliners and military aircraft at cruising altitude) and also the craft did not produce a contrail at all although its reflection from the sun was similar to that on aircraft at similar altitudes. i don't know if the craft could have been a satellite as its trajectory was similar to one however as far as i know satellites in orbit or space stations are not visible during daylight hours (let alone in the bright sunlit late morning sky) it appeared to be too large and high-altitude to be a normal drone of some sort and the crafts identity and origin is still puzzling to me. in the years of watching the skies i have very rarely seen something i cannot identify or explain although there have been a few occasions in and around the area of plympton, ma and surrounding towns i have noticed very high, small, silver or shiny objects during bright cloudless days on at least 3-4 occasions before this, they usually appear to be at an incredible altitude with an indefinable shape due to the distance and are either entirely stationary or moving at a relatively slow pace in its position, this object was similar to those instances in its reflective nature but appeared to be moving at a more rapid and constant pace with more of a definable shape and if i were to guess it appeared to be somewhat lower. i will continue scanning the local skies, now with good binoculars at hand and will continue to report further sightings if they are to occur and try to get photo/video the next time around.
content.summary: Shiny oval or cigar shaped object moving swiftly in a constant direction at high-altitude, no wings or contrail visible

content.detailedDescription: So this happened last night. i had just saw a movie with a friend and didn't feel like going home so i headed to a local city overlook to enjoy the view and smoke a couple ciggs. i was only there for a few minutes before i started looking at the stars. it was a very clear night and even with the large amount of light pollution, they were quite bright. just then, something blocked out one of the stars in my immediate view. i quickly caught sight of a black, boxey, angular craft moving completely silently across the sky. no lights, no exhaust, no noise. the only reason i was able to see it was because of the light pollution making the sky brighter than the black craft. it is difficult to speculate on the size and altitude as there were no markers, but if i had to guess, i would say it was cruising at about 250-350ft and was maybe 2-3 times the size of an average helicopter. where i saw it wasn't straight above me, but instead out in front and up. the craft was moving pretty quickly and i only saw it for maybe 1.5 seconds.
content.summary: Black, silent, angular craft went across the sky blocking out stars

content.detailedDescription:
As i was looking out the south door of my house in nelson, nebraska, i heard something like a buzzing sound followed by the appearance of a yellow pinpoint of light about the size of a firefly. the object/light remained visible for about 30 seconds before disappearing. a few seconds later the light reappeared about a half block away to the south. it remained visible for a short period of time before disappearing again.  

***************
this is the second strange event i've experienced.  in early 2016, as i looked out the same door of my house one night, i saw a bright light approximately 300 yards to the south hovering above some trees.  as i watched, i thought to myself, "oh no, they've seen me." immediately, these words came into my brain, "we've already seen you."  suddenly, the light came to within approximately 150 yards of the house, stopped, then disappeared. however, before it did so i perceived a blue light on top.

i remain perplexed as to how/why two such strange events could occur near our house in this tiny nebraska town (pop. 500), at the precise moment day and time that i was looking out the door.
content.summary: Pinpoint of light about the size of a firefly appeared in the street, disappeared then reappeared ca 1/2 block away.

content.detailedDescription: we were watching the evening news when the weather lady suggested on television to look for this rocket launch at 6:45 so we went outside my wife and i to observe it we seen this flight and i took pictures of it .I new it wasn't a star or  the moon  so i assumed it was the rocket i took some pictures and took some pictures .The next day i found out that they canceled the launch due to a boat in the chesapeake bay but i know i seen something i,so i looked at pictures i took the first three pictures shows a round light the last two shows nothing but if i look closely you see the round circle with the out line of a light!!!
content.summary: Was observing a rocket launch from chesapeake bay in virginia the event never occurred but we seen this or have pictures of it very interesting

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down a curvy rd about noon.  saw cylindrical object with several angular appertunances....Like a small fin  and maybe windows up front.  it was heading downward into some trees.  i nearly crashed.  and it descended below the tree line.  it wasn't an airplane and it wasn't w helicopter.
content.summary: Size of half a 727, polished silver with fins

content.detailedDescription: One summer evening in the early 1990s (i do not recall the exact month or year), my wife and i were in our back yard just after sunset, lying on chaise lounges and waiting to see how soon we could see the first star in the waning light.  this was in erdenheim, pa, a residential suburb just north of philadelphia.  to aid in our quest, i had with me a pair of 14x70 astronomical binoculars that i had often used to explore the night sky as an amateur astronomer.  the sky was clear and the evening was windless and quiet.  while scanning the sky near the zenith, and before any stars became visible, i noticed a tiny dark shape directly overhead, silhouetted against the fading sky.  it was semicircular in shape (like a half moon), did not reflect any glint of sunlight despite its apparent great altitude (seemingly high enough to have been still in direct sunlight), and did not exhibit any lights or contrail.  there was no sound.  as i watched it for a minute or so, i observed that it was moving very slowly southward, in the direction of its curved end.  i told my wife what i was seeing and handed the binoculars to her; she had no difficulty finding and tracking it.  for the next 10-15 minutes, we continued to pass the binoculars back and forth, watching it.  as we watched, it maintained its slow speed in a curving path of constant radius that eventually completed a 90-degree left-hand turn toward the east.  it rotated as it flew, such that its curved end was always pointing in the direction of its motion.  without nearby reference points, it was difficult to estimate its size, altitude, or speed with any precision.  however, assuming it to be of a similar size as conventional aircraft, it was much higher than any commercial airliner, and moving much too slowly to have been sustained aloft by conventional aerodynamic lift.  my estimate at the time was that it was well above 40,000 feet and moving less than 50 mph.  although distinctly visible as a dark shape at 14x magnification (though with no structural details visible), it was too high to see at all with the unaided eye.  after 10-15 minutes, we stopped watching it and turned our attention back to stars that were finally beginning to emerge; it had become increasingly hard to track the object in the darkening sky and its slow consistent flight had become tedious to watch.  it was not an unpowered balloon, because of its curved flight path and its shape (squared off at the back and moving in the direction of its short axis).  it was not a helicopter, because it was much too high and silent, as well as lacking navigation lights and having the wrong shape for any helicopter.  it was not a bird, because there was never any flapping of wings and, again, the shape was wrong for a bird, with no visible head, neck, or tail.  it was not a conventional aircraft, because of its extremely slow speed and the lack of any navigation lights, as well as the lack of any sound or contrail.  it was not a dirigible, because of its shape and the fact of its motion in the direction of its short axis; also, propeller-driven dirigibles do not cruise in the stratosphere.  we assumed it might have been some classified experimental aircraft, especially given our proximity to the willow grove naval air station, and therefore gave it no further thought – although i did always wonder whether experimental aircraft (even those flying well above commercial air lanes) were required to display navigational lights, especially after dark.
content.summary: High, slow, dark, and silent

content.summary: High, slow, dark, and silent

content.detailedDescription:
Approximately may 1974, while i was  a capt in the air force, i had recently returned from germany,, stationed at nellis afb, & was living with mother-in-law in henderson, nevada,  it was about 9:00 pm, watching tv, dog went outside & started barking.  my wife went out back door & looked back over the house where the dog was looking.  she immediately screamed for me to come outside. i & mother-in-law quickly joined wife.  she pointed up over the house & demanded to know, " what the hell is that? ". i looked up, jaw dropped & hesitated for about 30 seconds trying to come up with a different explanation, than what was obvious. finally i said, " sob, that's a flying saucer.  it was the standard traditional ufo that is portrayed in the movies, to include lights around the center of a saturn shaped huge vehicle that was hovering , just north of us in the approximate vicinity of the henderson industrial complex..  we watched it hovering silently for about 5 minutes, when it started to slowly heading west, down lake mead blvd.  i suggested getting my car keys to follow it.  i ran inside, & wife said, never mind, because it took off at a tremendous speed & was quickly over black mountain & disappeared. no sonic boom, no sound at all.  we were unaware of any aircraft that was capable of that kind of performance.
my wife called the air force to report the sighting & was basically thanked, with no further action necessary, as i cynically expected.  she also called the henderson police & reported the sighting.   the next day there was an article in the newspaper that a henderson policeman driving east on lake mead blvd sighted the moving flying saucer & unsuccessfully tried to take a picture.  i'm amazed that even today we may have seen one of the largest flying saucers ever reported
content.summary: 3 of us saw huge flying saucer hovering over henderson nv, industrial  plants

content.detailedDescription: Too many in sky to be airplanes. moving too fast to be human. 18 witnesses.
content.summary: 15+ blinking lights seen flying in straight paths

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i were in the town of longton with  our girlfriends when we saw what at first looked like a helicopter hovering over a church about half a mile away but much larger than a helicopter and not the same shape, as we looked it suddenly appeared almost over our heads in lass than a second and stopped dead just hovering with no noise,
at the front or what we took to be the front was a long window with a bright pure white light coming from inside, we could fron the angle of view an how low it was above us see inside the cabin but saw no persons inside.
the craft hovered above us for three of four minutes then suddenly shot off in a southerly direction before stopping dead approx, even at that distance away it was the size of a tennis ball three miles away above a village that we knew the distance of from where we were and it hovered there for about two more minutes it travelled that distance again in less than a second before shooting off again towards an area known as stone where we couldn't see it any longer due to the horizon.
i can honestly say that at that time none of us had heard of ufo's so we weren't exactly scared and were just fascinated by how fast this thing could move the distances it did in so short a time, i still have no fear of this sort of thing after all these years, but did experience time loss a couple of years ago while walking homeand ended up two streets from the street i live in totally disoriated not knowing why i was there.
this has been in my memory all these years and is as clear today as it was on the night it happened.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Tri angle, bigger than a football field, hovering almost above our heads

content.detailedDescription:
I was about 7 or 8 years old visiting my brother in linden, ca at his group home roughly around the summertime. i woke up to flashing lights and the dog barking at something, and i thought at the time it was like police lights outside, the bedroom, so i looked outside. i saw a cylinder shaped object in the front yard, with bright multicolored flashing lights and spinning around the top in a circle. it was hovering, close to the ground if i were to guess now probably 10 feet off of the ground, and i remember a strange buzzing noise. my brother was sleeping in the same room, so i tried to see if he was awake but he didn't wake up. time was very slow, almost like everything stopped, but i could still move. i saw a bright white light coming from the hallway, in the room my brothers group home mother slept in. the light was so bright almost like a big spot light almost blinding, and i thought i was dreaming, and being curious i walked over toward the door to see what the bright white light was down the hall. what i saw i will never forget ever in my lifetime. i saw a tall dark skinny almost human shaped body, figure come out of the room and stand by her doorway, it was not dressed it had no clothes, no genitals, it had dark charcoal grey skin, long fingers but it only had two or three fingers. the figure had a strangely large head, no hair, but the shape of the head was round with a point on the top. i remember the dark black eyes the most like black mirrors, that where teardrop shaped, they slanted up on the right and left side and they did not close, it also didn't have a nose, just 2 small slits below the eyes and a small mouth. i stood there trying to figure out what i was seeing and it stared at me. then i saw 2 more and they looked at each other, they didn't speak or make any noises at all, and then they started walking toward me, at first i froze, i was so scared, i panicked. is all i could think to do was to run, so i  turned around and jumped on my bed, and put the covers over me and crawled into a ball, and closed my eyes, i was shaking so bad, i prayed that it was only a dream, and that they would not come. i don't remember anything after that. 
i also remember i wasn't scared at the site of the first alien it kept tilting its head while it was looking at me, i was trying to understand what i was seeing, and i was curious as we just stared at each other for about 1-2 minutes about 8 feet away from each other, i did have the urge to walk towards it but never did, something initially was comforting to me, i cannot explain that feeling. it seemed to somehow report to the others without talking that i was awake and that is when they came. i did get spooked when the other two of them came towards me, and i remember not feeling the same way about them, i felt an uncomfortableness with them. i remember feeling like time stopped or slowed in some way, and everything around was completely oblivious to what was happening around me. 
the part that i find odd was that the group home mother later had tumors, and deceased because of them. i always wondered if that was the cause, or if they were there to help her. i have only shared this story with 2 people, only because i don't know what to make of it. i usually questioned myself if it was just a dream, but i can remember everything, the feeling, the lights, slow movements, the encounter, the fear. i of course do not have any evidence also another reason for not really discussing it with anyone because i thought people would accuse me of making it up.
content.summary: Encounter with grey aliens

content.detailedDescription: Travelling home from school with my kids one evening we were heading west in the car when my eldest son pointed out what looked like a comet in the sky. when we pulled into the gas station nearby i got out and began recording a golden copper orb travelling through the north skies heading east. i watched and followed it until it disappeared at warp speed. it wasn't until watching the video later that i noticed i had captured the high pitch hum off this object taking off, which was pretty exciting considering most tend to be silenced by some force field or what not. my feelings well, i feel we all need to know and stop being so willfully ignorant, we all need to look up more. we've never been alone.
content.summary: Orb came in like comet, travelling east, then took off at warp speed with a high pitch hum.

content.detailedDescription: I was working and noticed a bright ligjt in the sky it went in one direction away from me and then started coming back toward me. then the thing just  vanished out of thin air no cloud cover it was a bright lile ball ouf redish orange light.
content.summary: Red ball of light

content.detailedDescription: Went 2 dallas ravens game november 19 2016 took pictures of buildings and skyline november 18th in the morning bright cloudless day nothing in the sky didn't notice what i got in my cellphone pictures until march 18th 2017 not balloon star planet or clouds didn't c anything in the sky have pictures of ufo from 2 angles bright blue sky's!!! please explain 2 me!!!!! never saw ufo only noticed later!! very excited!!! i am a believer now!!! never saw object!!!
content.summary: Went outside took picture of skyline downtown dallas didn't c anything no clouds nothing in the sky blue sky 🌞 shine

content.detailedDescription: While standing outside looking toward north star, i briefly observed what appeared to be a light, similar to a star or planet, moving in an arc-like path from polaris toward the big dipper. it moved so that the arc descended towards earth and rose up. after 3 or four seconds, it faded out, similar to how issobservations do. upon researching iss sighting possibilities for this date and time according to my zip code, the iss was not visible in that part of the sky at that time, approximately 6:30 in the morning (am). i also have never observed a light in the sky move in an arc- like path. previous observations made by me of the iss have always shown relatively straight flight paths. again, path was arc, with low part of arc towards earth, very brief, and did not span much distance. brightness of object relative to north star was three quaters as bright, eventually fading out completely. it probably was a satellite, but arc path was odd for sarellite, tight arc, 160 degrees total arc path, appx. from my left to right.
content.summary: Looking towards north star.Big dipper to right. object between bd and ns moved from ns toward bd in semi circular path l to r and then faded out. path was from n to w.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down chester pike & i noticed what i assumed was a very bright star. it was right ahead of me, i seen it while looking through the windshield. i'm always looking at the sky & i know that venus is usually the brightest star in the sky, so i assumed it was venus. it seemed out of place though. i asked myself, is that venus? and then i see start moving, & im freaking out like, what?! am i tripping? the further i drive along the road, i notice that it's hovering because it's now on the left side of me. so at first it was in front of me and as i'm coming up to it i have to look out the left window to see it. no exaggeration when i say it looked like a star. like i said it thought it was venus. when it started moving abruptly, it kind of looked like it was "looking for something" idk that's my best guess., i can't really tell if it was over a building but from my view that's what it looked like. after switching directions a few times, it started descending straight down very gracefully. very deliberate movements. i knew it was some kind of intelligent being/energy. i wanted to grab my camera but i was like in a trance watching it, i didn't want to turn away because i knew that i was witnessing something very special. it was descending for a few seconds so i know that it was really high up before it went behind a building that was about 100ft from me & it blocked my view from it. i started crying the moment it started moving. not from fear, i was in awe. after i cried i got really scared bc i didn't know what it was or what was happening.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Star starts moving back & forth really quickly and then descended straight down

content.detailedDescription:
I live about 200ft from the water (the sound near the atlantic), very few area lights, so its very dark. weather was clear an in the 50's this night, and my dad and myself were sitting on the back porch chatting. he commented on the stars and how nice it was that it was so clear here. i looked up and saw a craft coming around 12-15,000mph east->west off the horizon and it was well into the upper atmosphere. id guess, 10-12miles up. well above aircraft cruise level. had no blinking lights, no fluctuation in color, size, brightness, and no moon out. it was very large itself however.

both my dad and myself have decades of experience with aircraft and living near military bases. it stood out like a sore thumb since no experimental craft are used here. mcas and lejune both confirmed no aircraft in the area when we called. did a satnav check, and no known satellites were overhead at that time. dead silent night.
content.summary: Extreme altitude craft seen over east coast nc

content.detailedDescription: Ok you want to know, mind at least 4 times a week leaves this planet and goes to somewhere their are getting informatain for our world. it started 6 month ago, i can giv details of what i have i have seen. i know how things work while i am there. i know my wife there. i know whet i do there.  i know we or them will be here by 2024. use this as you want just a heads up. next week i will see if i can stay or cross over to there.
content.summary: I was there in person

content.detailedDescription: I was in a boat fishing with my grand daughter and wife. i heard a jet over head and i looked up, as i often do to observe. the jet was nearly straight over head at very hi altitude traveling from the east to the west. it looked like a three engine md11 or perhaps even a kc 10 air force tanker jet. i co hat my attention back to fishing for a couple of seconds then looked back up to refocus on the jet. it had moved on to the west and i could not see it without turning around on my seat. i could follow the three contrails and was about to reposition when the shiny object close to the contrails caught my attention. i thought it first to be a star or other heavenly object as it was stationary. all of a sudden it started moving at a very hi rate of speed to the east. i shouted to my wife and grand daughter to look at the object i was pointing at but they never saw it as it was moving extremely fast. it left no contrail nor sound and i kept my eye on it until i could no longer see it.
content.summary: Star light object close to large airliner

content.detailedDescription:
A friend and i were travelling home from a class we attend around 10.15 pm, in the car. we were travelling on an unlit road. an orange ball shot from our right stopped in front of the car just above windscreen level approx 15 feet away and then shot off at incredible speed leaving a short trail of orange behind itself which disappeared instantly. the ball orb sphere, whatever you would call it, left so fast it became invisible almost instantly.I was the passenger in the car. my mouth fell open in disbelief at what i saw, i turned to my friend, (the driver) and at the same time she turned to me. it was as if we could not get the words out. i said, and she said at the same time,did you see that!. we then said omg! what the hell was that!We were a little shaken by it and also in disbelief.We spent the remainder of the journey trying to fathom out what it could be. the road had no other cars apart from one behind us that we later found out was a friend that had been to the class that we had attended earlier. i text him to see if he had arrived home safe as i often do and said omg!I have something to tell you. he replied, i have something to tell you also.He then said, did you see that orange ball thing come over the road, i replied yes thats what i was going to tell you. he said i was right behind you. i saw it come from the right.
i have never in my life seen anything like it. i felt excited to see such a thing but also a little apprehensive as to what was going on. it was as if we were being checked out or something a bit unnerving to say the least at the time.
content.summary: Orange ball appeared , hovered then shot of at great speed

content.detailedDescription: While driving north east, a bright, circular light was seen in the sky hovering.  then quickly zoomed downward at a very fast speed and seemed to completely diminish.
content.summary: A bright round light in the sky hovered then quickly zoomed downward and dissappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was looking for a craft which i could video as i had seen a couple ufos previously it hovered over the distance i have been trying to connect via conscious thought. would be very grateful if someone could point out if this was likely extra terrestrial
content.summary: Reddish orange orb floating accross sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was moving my washing and let dog out for dog stuff, i looked at the dark clouds it was raining and i saw things then they werent there then i saw them glow then a thing fell down fast on the house behind mine no noise no anyting after that 
i called my dog and went inside fast as i could
it was still light didnt dawn on me to put in sighting as i was still wandering whats going on and hope they dont come for me again 
i was afraid and wondering where will i sleep 
after bout an hour i decided to put in the sighting 
i did not film it all my cameras dont work no more for some reason 
nor my phone 
but it wasnt round when it came down it looked like a lift to me square shape 
in sky it was like a oval shape 
it was black and squarish but then it was so fast im not sure now
content.summary: Behind my house i saw 3 then 2 then one fell down fast real fast on house top

content.detailedDescription: Golden orb out of nowhere. gyroscopic beams came out. split into 2 gyroscopic beams again. came together then took off. seen over valley forge area pheonixville. perfectly clear night.
content.summary: Golden orb suddenly sppears. hums..Not motionless. shoots out beams up and down. beams create a gyroscopic pattern. beams retract. orb dplits into 2. two orbs emmit beams. beams goes gyroscopic. beams retract. orbs come together. single original orb takes

content.detailedDescription: At the time of my sighting, i was at the lake with my ex and at the time my 'friend.' who is now my gf, trying to have a good time at old fall creek, which is a lake.. anyways, it was a clear night with lots of stars.. we had been there close to an hour and we was the only people that i know of that was at the lake. i never noticed if there was any more witnesses besides us. but i had got bored and decided that we could all use a little bit of music. naturally i had the sound on my phone turned full blast.. as i started to play music, i noticed to my right, what appeared to me at the time to be a helicopter.. it was flying very low, very close to trees.. but i didnt notice the trees moving and the object wasnt flying, it was hovering. thats when i noticed that it wasnt making any kind of sound.. we all 3 noticed, although i could hear them talking and freaking out, i couldnt help but to stare in awe.. it was a solid object that was about 30 feet away from us.. it was a large black triangular object with red and white lights, sometimes orange. the weirdest part about this and what made me finally decide to report this. is im missing time. im not for sure if an 'abduction' happened but i remember watching this object, but the next thing i remember is being in the car and driving away from the lake... i dont recall ever even getting inside the car or driving away in a hurry for that manner.. i have dwelled on this for years, i didnt know what else to do.. everybody that ive told about this, acts as if im making this up or im going crazy.. so i thought maybe you guys might read this with more of an open mind.. i know what i saw and it was unlike anything ive ever seen in my life..
content.summary: Triangular object with pulsing red/ orange and white lights

content.detailedDescription: I went out on the porch to have a cigarette & remarked to myself how clear & beautiful the stars were, then i noticed what at 1st i thought was a satellite. then it slowed to a stop, sat there a few seconds then started just moving back & forth. it seemed to be like a little kid would be in a car for the 1st time! it kinda wiggled, then went a bit faster than made a few tight circles, then some more of the same until it kinda stopped & then took off at the fastest i'd seen it move to the east & kinda faded away!! wow
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other,Unknown
content.summary: I thought at 1st it was a sat. but then slowed, stopped 4 a few seconds then moved around in a relatively small area! made little back & forth movements, some fast & then the fastest 1 i saw & faded out!

content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking a cigarette around 10:45 pm i saw what looked to be geese flying from south to north of my location it looked like a projection of three yellow transparent geese in formation i thought it was the alcohol taking effect when suddenly my sister who was also smoking a cigarette outside said holy @#$%^&* jeff you see that'' so i already off the porch to see if i can still see it and neighbor had their stupid auto flood light set to auto. but it seems whatever it was already crossed by my field of view over my bedroom roof to be exact after words i spoke to my dad in new jersey telling what me and my sister saw i was so shocked after getting the phone with my dad i started crying.
content.summary: Yellow transparent object in the form of geese or gooses
